text: docs play a very important role
and it doesn't mean that your software
or your system or whatever you have is
not self-explanatory it doesn't mean
that it doesn't like the crutch you put
it perfectly it's not that it's another
layer another perspective to your
product
to what you build to what you believe in
so how do you capture that i really
strongly believe that docs are an api to
the product and we need to treat them
like there are several different
interfaces you know there's the sdk
there's the web there's the application
and then there's documentation it's an
interface for the code and when you
think about it that way it really helps
you connect the docs to the code in a
way that is just going to empower more
people to use your product
[Music]
